physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 9 x 11 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Typed on a piece of paper taped to the back of the photograph: ''Catholic and Jewish leaders gather for recent Conference on ''Attitudes and Images - A Catholic - Jewish Dialogue'' at Regis College sponsored by the College and the Anti-Defamation League of B'nai B'rith. More than 300 persons attended the one-day session. Shown above are, l. to r., former Judge Charles Rosenbaum, member of the ADL's National Executive Committee, Oscar Cohen, New York; ADL National Program Director and opening speaker at the conference; James Reed, Denver attorney and Christian Family Movement leader, chairman of the opening session; The Rev. Francis J. Malecek, S.J., Assistant Professor of Philosophy at Regis College, Chairman of the Conference Steering Committee; Mrs. Don Burton, Christian Family Movement, member of the steering committee.''

mods.abstract: Left to right former Judge Charles Rosenbaum, member of the ADL's National Executive Committee; Oscar Cohen, ADL National Program Director and opening speaker at the conference; James Reed, Denver attorney and Christian Family Movement leader and chairman of the opening session; the Rev. Francis J. Malecek, S. J., assistant professor of Philosophy at Regis College and chairman of the conference steering committee; and Mrs. Marilyn Burton from the Christian Family Movement and member of the steering committee during an Anti-Defamation League Catholic-Jewish Dialogue meeting at Regis College in Denver.

name.namePart: B'nai B'rith.--Anti-defamation League.--Mountain States Regional Office
